page.title: 06YOUTH CLUBS.
page.content: Today in Croy there are clubs for children and adults.There is a club for girls called the Girls Brigade.It is for girls aged{5 to 16}.They have entertainments like discos, parties and going camping.Some seniors do their Duke of Edinburgh Award.To achieve this they hike,walk,camp and take part in a sport.Every year they have a competition and this year they coloured eggs with different colours of paint.Croy Girls Brigade gets together with other groups and a judge picks the best one and that group wins a cup for the year.Unfortunately our team did not win this time. The Cubs are for boys.It entertains all ages from {8 to 11}years.It does lots of entertainments like trailing in woods,football and camping.Every year they go away to a Father and Son camp.
